about.title: About Me
about.description: Computer Engineering graduate specialized as a Full Stack Developer with Front-End focus. 3 years of professional experience developing modern, functional, and user-centered interfaces. Proficient in Svelte, Vue.js, JavaScript (ES6+), CSS3 and state management with Redux. Experience in Back-End development with .NET Core MVC, ASP.NET, REST API consumption and SQL Server databases. Also a Prompt Engineer, capable of creating useful AI prompts that automate work areas and generate innovative ideas. Motivated by innovation, teamwork and continuous learning in agile methodologies like Scrum.

goals.shortTerm: Establish myself as a Senior Full Stack Developer expert in Svelte and Vue.js, expand my technical leadership managing 3-5 developer teams, become an enterprise specialist in AI automation, and secure a Tech Lead position at a larger-scale company with cloud computing certifications.
goals.longTerm: Evolve towards Software Architect designing scalable systems and cloud microservices (Azure/AWS), assume Tech Lead/Engineering Manager role managing 10+ developer teams, lead enterprise-level AI implementation with measurable ROI, and optionally launch a technology startup focused on enterprise automation.
